featured.text: Dooley attempts to save the old man by a ritual learned from comic books: killing a turtle and trading his soul for Grandfather’s.
Dooley keeps Peanuts company while the adults in the family attend to Grandfather.
For example, my grandfather was one of ten children in his family, but I am the only child.
Peanuts’ beloved grandfather has suffered a heart attack.

other.text: My grandfather has astonishing powers of .
Peanuts is sad over the possibility of losing his grandfather.

definition.example: My grandfather tells the best stories from his childhood.
